text.__SUMMARY__: Rhododendron wrayi is a species of plant in the family Ericaceae. It is endemic to Peninsular Malaysia.
text.References: Chua, L.S.L. (1998). "Rhododendron wrayi". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T31465A9630513. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T31465A9630513.en. Retrieved 18 December 2017.
